data.name: Poker VR - Multi Table Tournaments
data.description:
Welcome to Poker VR! Enjoy tournaments and cash games like a pro.

Top Features:
- Hand Tracking Support: Use your hands for interaction.
- Cool Avatars: Express yourself with customized avatars.
- For Quest Players: Clear and sharp visuals for a great experience.
- Realistic Actions: Mimic a real casino with lifelike gestures.
- Casino Vibes: More than just a table, it feels like a casino.
- Chips and Tricks: Have fun stacking and playing with chips.
- Big Tournaments: Join large tournaments with live leaderboards.
- Casino Scouting: Check out casinos before picking a table.
- Smart Friends System: Easily join your friends' games.

Brand New Addition: Team Showdowns! Engage in thrilling team battles in tournaments and cash games.

Poker VR offers tournaments, cash games, and the exciting new team showdowns. Dive into a global community for an awesome poker journey!
